name: Condor Gold plc Ordinary Shares
longDescription: Condor Gold PLC is a gold exploration and development company with a focus on Central America. The company focused on proving a large commercial reserve on its 100% owned La India Project in Nicaragua. It generates revenue from the sale of gold and silver.
fulldescription: Condor Gold PLC is a gold exploration and development company with a focus on Central America. The company focused on proving a large commercial reserve on its 100% owned La India Project in Nicaragua. It generates revenue from the sale of gold and silver.
fullAddress: 7/8 Innovation Place,Douglas Drive, Godalming, Surrey, GB
